channel.title: Teaching on MARK SCHEUERELL
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on MARK SCHEUERELL

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Applied Time Series Analysis in Fisheries & Environmental Sciences with Eli Holmes & Eric Ward Offered during the winter quarter of odd years as FISH 507 in the School of Aquatic and Fishery Sciences at the University of Washington. Time Series Analysis In February of 2019 I taught a half-day training session at NOAA Fisheries’ Protected Species Assessment Workshop in La Jolla, California. Applied Time Series for Ecology with Eli Holmes
